mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum rnum, c.* from ( select a.id, a.name, a.password, a.email from member a where order by a.create_date desc ) c ) where rnum between #{firstRecordIndex} + 1 and #{lastRecordIndex}
select id, name, password, email from member where id = #{id}
select id, name, email from member where id = #{id} and password = #{password}
mapper.insert: insert into member (id, name, password, email) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{email})
mapper.update: update member set name = #{name}, password = #{password}, email = #{email} where id = #{id}
update member set password = #{password}, modify_date = sysdate where id = #{id}
